name: Forest Stairs
description:
This is a very short horror game based on the Forest Stairs conspiracy theory. 

You're out for a walk in the woods when you see a random staircase that leads to nowhere. The stairs look as if they're meant to be part of some structure, they look out of place.

Will you stand on top of them? How long are you willing to?

Tip: Wait on top of the staircase.

Don't forget to give a rating to show your thoughts!

ALSO:

I'm working on a much larger horror game at the moment called Bodhi 'n' Friends - so if you're into a more longer and more story-driven experience, go check out the demo for Bodhi 'n' Friends:
